document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Asia Minor , Iran , Kazakhstan ( Colonnelli 2013 ).

Biology. Xerothermic grasslands, screes, wetlands, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in III–VIII. On Papaveraceae :
Fumaria officinalis
;
F. capreolata F. parviflora
,
F. schleicheri
( Hoffmann 1954 ; Dieckmann 1972b ; Smreczyński 1974 ; Kryzhanovskaya 1977 ).
